query: "What treatment options are available for drug misuse, and when was the last time this issue was addressed in my medical record?"
resource_summaries: This record indicates a patient's active and confirmed condition of misusing drugs, diagnosed during an encounter on August 28, 2019.
answer: The treatment options available for drug misuse typically include therapy, counseling, support groups, and medication-assisted treatment. The last time the issue of drug misuse was addressed in your medical record was on August 28, 2019.
